description:
Learn all you need to to create your own eBooks that you can sell on for close to 100% profit - and all you need for this is Microsoft Word. Any version will work for this as the overall principals are the same.

Once you know how to create your own digital eBooks, the possibilities become endless. You can then create your own products that no one else can replicate.

Over 800 students have already jumped on this course and are already making good use of the knowledge!

eBooks and selling digital information in general is hot right now. people love buying digital products and enjoy the instant gratification that the ability to download their ebook gives them.

You could publish your own profit pulling eBook to the popular Amazon Kindle marketplace, write a successful eBook for the Click Bank or JV Zoo digital info selling platforms - or even create a eBook that you can give away for free on your website in order to capture peoples email addresses.

This course will take you through how to write your own eBook in Microsoft Word and then successfully convert your word document into an industry recognised Adobe PDF format.

It is much easier than you think, and is the kind of knowledge that you can always make use of.

What you will learn on this course:

  • How to create a professional cover page for your eBook in MS Word
  • Inserting an automatically updating table of contents
  • Adding content and formatting correctly
  • Converting from a word document into an Adobe PDF

The course is direct and too the point as we don't believe in adding fluff content just to artificially increase the length!

It's going to be fun. See you on the inside!
title: Learn to Create your own Adobe PDF eBook in Microsoft Word
